column4: alright people... I need to know if I can trust the QQ Linux client? I have a meeting with a chinese client and they will only use QQ >.>
it's all in chinese... but as long as I can navigate my way to chat I should be okay... however I just wanted to know if I can trust it
you can't use a segregated VM that will be deleted immediately afterwards?
simple solution if you're paranoid about it.
I could but the hardware support isn't so good for a video call... I just don't trust a chinese company in a communist state with root access to my machine...
from what I've heard... it wants root access every time it's run
